HOME.TITLE: About the job:
HOME.ABOUT: Join our leading-edge team in the domain of extracting body measurements from images using cutting-edge deep learning techniques. We pride ourselves on developing top-tier solutions and value the diversity and expertise of our team members.
HOME.OVERVIEW-TEXT: We are looking for a passionate Frontend Developer to help bring our digital visions to life.
HOME.RES-1: Develop, test, and launch highly responsive and intuitive user interfaces.
HOME.RES-2: Collaborate closely with UX/UI designers to implement innovative frontend solutions.
HOME.RES-3: Integrate MediaPipe functionalities into our frontend applications.
HOME.RES-4: Optimize applications for speed and scalability while ensuring application security.
HOME.RES-5: Transform design wireframes into the code that produces visual elements of the application.
HOME.RES-6: Stay updated with emerging frontend technologies and best practices.
HOME.RES-7: Collaborate with backend developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
HOME.RES-8: Use GitHub effectively for code collaboration, version control, and code reviews.
HOME.RES-9: Stay updated with emerging frontend technologies, especially MediaPipe developments and best practices.
HOME.REQ-1: Proven experience as a Frontend Developer or similar role.
HOME.REQ-4: Strong proficiency with GitHub for version control, collaboration, and best practice.
HOME.REQ-5: Familiarity with browser testing and debugging.
HOME.REQ-6: Strong understanding of responsive design and mobile-first principles.
HOME.REQ-8: Familiarity with version control tools, preferably Git.
HOME.REQ-9: Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
HOME.REQ-10: Strong team collaboration abilities and good communication skills.
HOME.SKILL-1: Experience in MediaPipe is a plus.

ERROR.NAME: Name is required!
ERROR.LAN-LVL: If you added a language, the language level is necessary!
ERROR.SKILL-LVL: If you added a skill, the skill level is necessary!

SUCCESS.TITLE: Thank you for applying.
SUCCESS.TEXT: we will assess your skills, and if there is a match, we will contact to provide you with instructions for the next steps!
